overview: Adapted from the original work of the repertoire of Henan Xuchang District. Zhang Chunyang is an expert in making baskets in the team, and his wife Zhang Auntie is the deputy head of the team. The old couple love the collective, are active in production, can help each other, and live a happy life. One day, Hu Jixiang, who had been an agent on the old society episode, came to Zhang Chunyang, under the guise of the production team..
title: 山村新曲: 卖萝筐
